data.title: U.S. Court of Federal Claims: Campbell-Smith, Patricia Elaine
data.meta_description: Information on individual courts includes judge lists, succession charts, legislative history, district organization, meeting places, records and bibliographyâ€¦
data.text:
Born 1966 in Baltimore, MD

Federal Judicial Service:

Judge, U.S. Court of Federal Claims

Nominated by Barack Obama on March 19, 2013, to a seat vacated by Lawrence M. Baskir. Confirmed by the Senate on September 17, 2013, and received commission on September 19, 2013. Served as chief judge, 2013-2017. Service terminated due to retirement on certified disability on September 30, 2023.

Education:

Duke University, B.S.E.E., 1987

Tulane University Law School, J.D., 1992
